column4: This script cannot proceed automatically. If you believe that this
not correct, you can update the md5sum entry executing the following
otherwise edit manually /etc/X11/xorg.conf to change the Driver section
how do i change nv to nvidia?
you could always sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and choose nvidia as the driver
you got under a terminal and typed in "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" right?
alright the first screen you scroll through to find your driver which was nvidia I believe
leave it blank hit enter and then what
